author: Brad Stowers
comment: Great start timer for my Android Wear watch. Vibrations are very helpful, and the ability to set a specific start time is perfect for the Friday night beer can pursuit race.

Does a great job with the basic functions of a sailing race watch. Ability to set countdown length, sync function and reset are all easy. It also automatically starts a  timer once it hits zero. Would like to see more customization options.
title: Has the basics down

author: Randy Olinger
comment: Vibrations absolutely necessary since I can't see the watch face in the sun very well.
title: Great for basic timing

author: Randy Wendt
comment: Cool start time! Love that you can set a time of day start in hours, minutes and seconds. Perfect for the Thursday Night Bermuda start fun race we do.

author: Alec Seastrand
comment: awesome.  does exactly what it needs and should do.  they are spot on.
